title: Day 3 - February 2nd: Which numbers of multiples of ten?
subject: Math

instructions.c: Explore the elements of Unit 2
Watch the instructions to work on page 31 in your notebook.
Open your notebook on page 31. Solve the exercise as instructed in the video
Share your answers by using the sentences '2 tens equals 20, etc.'
Take homework, notebook page 33. Find the given sum using tens and write the numerals to the tens.

title: Reading Practice: A Day for Dad
subject: Lang

instructions.c: Practice reading a 'Day for Dad'. Click on the sentences and repeat.

words.cap: Dad and I do things together on father's day.
Dad and I eat breakfast on father's day.
Dad and I eat breakfast on father's day.
Dad and I ride bikes on father's day.
Dad and I play catch on father's day.
Dad and I have a picnic on father's day.
Dad and I buy caps on father's day.
Dad and I take naps on father's day.

instructions.c: Practice reading phrases. Click on the green phrases and use your microphone to record:

title: Day 2 - February 1st: What do you eat for breakfast?
subject: Lang

instructions.c: Explore the elements of Unit 2
Watch the video and ask your friends what they eat for breakfast
In your book, page 40, ask your partner what he or she eats for breakfast. Don't forget to write the date. Read instruction number 3 on your own.
Watch the video and solve the exercise on page 28 in your notebook.
Open your notebook on page 28. Write today's date: 1-2. Remember the steps in the video.
TRANSITION A CAN GO TO THE IPADS ROOM AND READ STORIES.

title: Day 2 - February 1st: How can I order numbers?
subject: Math

instructions.c: Explore the elements of Unit 2
Watch the video and learn how to order numbers in your notebook.
Open your notebook on page 30. Remember the steps in the video.
You can pause the video to remember the steps.
Read your answers. Say sentences like '42 COMES BEFORE 43' and '43 COMES AFTER 42'
If you have time, order numbers in your whietboard.
